docs.text: Python-steam-tradeoffer-manager ¶ Installation ¶ # using pip $ pip install steam-tradeoffer-manager # using pipenv $ pipenv install steam-tradeoffer-manager # using poetry $ poetry add steam-tradeoffer-manager Warning ⚠ ¶ There is one way to install this library now(until steamio new version with bugfixes will be released): $ pip install git+https://github.com/somespecialone/python-steam-tradeoffer-manager.git@master $ pipenv install git+https://github.com/somespecialone/python-steam-tradeoffer-manager.git@master $ poetry add git+https://github.com/somespecialone/python-steam-tradeoffer-manager#master Coming soon...
